Divine Messenger Lydia:
Then it is better that You experience it for yourself. It's hard to tell from the words of others. Such truth dispelled the mist from the slightest doubt.
The only way to find out may be the destruction of the Damned Ancient Heroes. They were once a mighty and fair, the gods themselves lovingly treated them, and now this greatness is almost nothing left... Here are their full names: Damn Victim Orbis, Cursed Guardian Of The Aurbis, Cursed Thrower Orbis, Damn Scientist Orbis, Cursed By An Ancient Hero Of The Aurbis, Damn Senior Scientist Of The Aurbis.
Having battled with them, You will come to know the essence of the Corruptive Darkness.
